Professional experiences

August 2011 - ...

Engineer to Information System Direction of the National Centre For Scientific Research, functional and technical manager on PLUME-FEATHER, which promote open source software in higher education and research communities, CNRS, Toulouse

Sept. 2007 - July 211

Engineer to Information System Direction of the National Centre For Scientific Research, technical architect on business intelligence projets (SAP BI, Informatica, Qlikview), CNRS, Toulouse

Sept. 2002 - August 2007

Engineer to Information System Direction of the National Centre For Scientific Research, technical architect of integration projects (EAI and EDI) and XML-related studies, CNRS, Toulouse

Feb. 2002 - June 2002

Building a datawarehouse with BW over SAP R/3, Airbus France, Toulouse (France)

Nov. 2001 - Dec. 2001

Overview of wireless network technologies in cooperation with the research institue IRIT (WPAN, WLAN, BLR, satellites, mobiles), IRIT, Toulouse (France)

May 2001 - June 2001

Building a distributed Information System with UML and CORBA, B&T Associés company, Toulouse (France)

June 2000 - Dec. 2000

Analyst-developer in the COM+ architecture in order to update a computerized ticketing system, CIMA company, Pau (France)

Feb. 1999 - March 1999

In charge of the development of an electronic boxes' management software in Visual Basic, SOULÉ firm, Bagnères de Bigorre (France)

June 1998 - June 1998

Webmaster of the INFORADOUR-ADIX's site (Tarbes), programming HTML pages, applets in JAVA and CGI scripts, INFORADOUR - ADIX company, Tarbes (France)
